alert.note: Alert for Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Southwestern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 28 at 3:26PM EST until January 30 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM SUNDAY TO 1 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. * WHERE...St. Lawrence and Franklin Counties. * WHEN...From 4 AM Sunday to 1 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions during the Sunday morning and evening commutes along NY Highway 11 and Route 37. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snowfall will occur between 7 AM and 7 PM. There could be a transition to rain or a rain and snow mix for portions of southeastern Saint Lawrence and southern Franklin County during the day on Sunday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Southwestern St. Lawrence
